mapper.select: select count(*) from user_role where org_user_id = #{orgUserId} and authority_code = #{authorityCode};
select authority_name from authority where authority_code = #{authorityCode}

select a.authority_code from organization_user o left join user_role ur on o.org_user_id = ur.org_user_id left join authority a on ur.authority_code = a.authority_code where o.org_user_id = #{orgUserId};
